sentinel.name: The Sentinel
sentinel.philosophy: A living fortress whose Aether-organ is attuned to combat. They perceive the battlefield as a flow of data to be processed and acted upon.

abilities.name: Battle Cognition
abilities.description: You have an advantage on all Initiative rolls and are immune to mundane fear. You have an advantage on rolls to resist supernatural fear.

abilities.name: Aetheric Defense
abilities.description: You have a pool of 3 regenerating Shield Boxes that absorb damage before your Health/Stun tracks.

abilities.name: Aetheric Overclock
abilities.description: Push your body past its limits. On a 10+, gain +1 to all Esper power rolls for a minute. On a 7-9, you succeed but gain 1 Temporary Corruption. On a 6-, your powers fail for the next turn.

dragoon.name: The Dragoon
dragoon.philosophy: Masters of mobility, treating the battlefield as a 3D space for sudden strikes and impossible repositioning.

abilities.name: Flash Step
abilities.description: Instantly move to any location you can see within a short distance without provoking attacks. A 7-9 causes 1 Stun damage or adds 1 DP.

abilities.name: Pierce the Sky
abilities.description: Perform a weaponized leap. On a 10+, your first melee attack upon landing automatically hits and deals +1 damage.

abilities.name: Aetheric Parkour
abilities.description: You can run up walls, slide down surfaces, and ignore movement penalties from difficult terrain.

lancer.name: The Lancer
lancer.philosophy: Hones the Dragoon's mobility into a single purpose: the perfect, unstoppable charge with a large two-handed melee weapon.

abilities.name: Flash Strike
abilities.description: Once per combat, teleport to an enemy and make a melee attack as a single action. This attack is impossible to dodge or parry.

abilities.name: Pierce the Sky II (Cratering Impact)
abilities.description: When you hit with Pierce the Sky, the impact creates a concussive blast, knocking down all adjacent characters and dealing 1 Stun damage.

abilities.name: Open Field Advantage
abilities.description: If no enemies are within 5 feet at the start of your turn, your first melee attack gains a +1 bonus.

rider.name: The Rider
rider.philosophy: Extends their mobility by forming a deep, supernatural bond with a mount, becoming a single synergistic entity.

abilities.name: Bond Mount
abilities.description: Forge a permanent Aetheric bond with a single vehicle or creature, granting it rudimentary intelligence and loyalty.

abilities.name: Summon Mount
abilities.description: Once per day, summon your Bonded Mount to your location as quickly as it can travel.

abilities.name: Mounted Mastery
abilities.description: You are a perfect rider. You can operate your Bonded Mount with expert proficiency, even if you've never used it before, and gain an advantage on all related rolls.

juggernaut.name: The Juggernaut
juggernaut.philosophy: An unstoppable, unbreakable wall of flesh and Aether. They are the anchor point of a battle, defined by momentum.

abilities.name: Tireless
abilities.description: You do not suffer the normal penalties from exhaustion, but you must spend twice the time resting in Downtime to recover.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Your next melee attack this turn automatically hits and deals +3 damage on a 10+. On a 7-9, it hits but leaves you open to attack.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.description: You gain a permanent +1 natural armor against both Wound and Blunt damage, which stacks with Aetheric Defense.

shield-warden.name: The Shield Warden
shield-warden.philosophy: The ultimate bodyguard, a living shield for a chosen ward.

abilities.name: Extend Defense
abilities.description: When an adjacent designated 'ward' is attacked, you can have the attack target you instead.

abilities.name: Full Defense
abilities.description: As your entire action, double the effectiveness of your Aetheric Defense and natural armor until your next turn.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: When wielding a physical shield, you can make a melee attack with it that deals significant Stun damage and can knock an opponent off balance.

brute.name: The Brute
brute.philosophy: Perfecting their own body into an instrument of overwhelming physical force.

abilities.name: Brawler Mastery
abilities.description: Your unarmed strikes are as deadly as any weapon, dealing significant Stun or Wound damage (player's choice).

abilities.name: Steel Skin
abilities.description: You gain a permanent +1 natural armor against Blunt damage.

abilities.name: Strength Boost
abilities.description: For one minute, your Tier of Effect for all Strength-based actions is increased by one.

knight.name: The Knight
knight.philosophy: A perfect union of person and plate, using Aether to summon, modify, and master a signature suit of armor.

abilities.name: Summon Armor
abilities.description: You can summon your one specific, bonded suit of armor onto your body instantly from any location.

abilities.name: Modify Armor
abilities.description: During Downtime, you can temporarily modify your armor, granting it a new, minor property for the next mission.

abilities.name: Armor Mastery
abilities.description: You are so attuned to your armor that you suffer none of the usual penalties for its weight or bulk.

battle-saint.name: The Battle Saint
battle-saint.philosophy: The best defense is a relentless offense. Focused on ending the fight, not just enduring it.

abilities.name: All In
abilities.description: Gain a +2 bonus on a single attack, but your Aetheric Defense is depleted and cannot regenerate until your next turn.

abilities.name: Assess Opponent
abilities.description: As an action, the GM will tell you an opponent's general fighting style and proficiency level.

abilities.name: Weapons Expert
abilities.description: You are considered Trained (0) with every weapon. The XP cost to reach Expert rank with a specific weapon is halved.

gun-saint.name: The Gun Saint
gun-saint.philosophy: The bullet is an extension of my will. A master of ballistic artistry who can defy physics and logic.

abilities.name: Bend It
abilities.description: Your shot curves around partial cover to hit its mark.

abilities.name: Bounce It
abilities.description: Make a ranged attack at a penalty to ricochet a shot off a surface and hit a target behind total cover.

abilities.name: Block It
abilities.description: Once per scene, as a reaction, you may make an opposed attack roll to shoot an incoming bullet out of the air.

sword-saint.name: The Sword Saint
sword-saint.philosophy: Masters of lethal minimalism, ending the fight with a single, perfect strike.

abilities.name: First Strike
abilities.description: At the start of combat, you can interrupt the initiative order to immediately take your turn. Your first attack gains a +1 bonus.

abilities.name: Aetheric Strike
abilities.description: Once per scene, your next melee attack ignores any defensive bonuses the target has from cover or defensive stances.

abilities.name: Final Strike
abilities.description: When you attack a disadvantaged enemy (stunned, prone), the attack is automatically a Critical Hit if it hits.

weapon-saint.name: The Weapon Saint
weapon-saint.philosophy: This is not a generalist path; it is the path of the ultimate specialist. The Weapon Saint has chosen to pour their entire martial identity into a single, signature weapon, becoming so attuned to it that the weapon is no longer a tool but an extension of their soul.

abilities.name: Attune Weapon
abilities.description: When you attack a disadvantaged enemy (stunned, prone), the attack is automatically a Critical Hit if it hits.

abilities.name: Master Weapon
abilities.description: Through your attunement, your skill with your chosen weapon has reached a level of supernatural mastery that transcends mere training.

abilities.name: Imbue Weapon
abilities.description: You can channel your Aetheric power through your attuned weapon, unleashing a single, spectacular signature move. This effect should be personal and defined by the player in collaboration with the GM when they first attune the weapon.

median.name: The Median
median.philosophy: The Median is a living conduit of biological Aether. Their power resonates with the patterns of life itself, allowing them to sense, influence, and mend the intricate biological processes of living beings. They are the doctors, the healers, and, at their most extreme, the architects of flesh.

abilities.name: Bioscan
abilities.description: You place your hand on a living being and attune your Aether-organ to its biological rhythms, allowing you to instantly diagnose its physical state. You know their exact Health and Stun boxes, can detect any diseases or poisons, and identify the presence of mutations or bioware.

abilities.name: Triage
abilities.description: You channel raw Aether directly into a wounded living being, kickstarting its natural healing processes. Clear two ticked boxes from one location's Stun Track OR one box from its Health Boxes. This can be used on yourself or a target you touch.

abilities.name: Treatment
abilities.description: You perform a more focused and sustained application of Aetheric healing to combat chronic conditions, diseases, or poisons. Over a period of minutes or even a scene, you can effectively treat one disease or poison affecting a target. On a successful roll, you either neutralize the poison, or halt the progression of a disease, allowing natural recovery to begin.

gene-splicer.name: The Gene-Splicer
gene-splicer.philosophy: Flesh is mutable. The Gene-Splicer has moved beyond simple mending to become an architect of biological form. They understand the Aetheric 'code' of life itself, allowing them to rewrite it.

abilities.name: Gene Mapping
abilities.description: You perform an incredibly detailed bioscan, not just of a being's current state, but of its fundamental biological blueprint. You gain access to the target's complete genetic code, revealing predispositions, hidden flaws, or latent mutations.

abilities.name: Corrective Therapy
abilities.description: You can manipulate a creature's genetic structure to remove flaws or integrate new biological components. Over a period of Downtime and with appropriate materials (bioware, tissue samples), you can repair chronic conditions or remove congenital defects.

abilities.name: Bio-Mods (Tier 1 & 2)
abilities.description: Your expertise allows you to understand and work with basic and corporate-grade bioware. You can install, maintain, and repair any Tier 1 or Tier 2 Bio-Mods on any willing or helpless subject.

bio-painter.name: The Bio-Painter
bio-painter.philosophy: Life is art. The Bio-Painter has taken the Gene-Splicer's mastery to an aesthetic level, manipulating flesh with precision to create new forms or enhance existing ones.

abilities.name: Genetic Memory Maker
abilities.description: You can sculpt and integrate new organs or tissues from raw Aether and genetic material, creating entirely new biological systems within a living being.

abilities.name: Synergy Specialist
abilities.description: You can enhance the synergy between two existing biological features in a target, granting a bonus to relevant rolls.

abilities.name: Tier 3 Bio-Mods
abilities.description: Your expertise extends to the most advanced and dangerous bioware. You can install, maintain, and repair Tier 3 Bio-Mods.

waker.name: The Waker
waker.philosophy: Potential is a key to be turned. The Waker can sense the 'Sparks' of latent Espers and, more terrifyingly, can force that potential into being.

abilities.name: Aetheric Masking
abilities.description: As long as you are not actively using your Esper powers, you are undetectable as an Esper to all forms of magical and psychic detection.

abilities.name: Sense the Spark
abilities.description: You can automatically sense the presence of other Espers and can make a Perception roll to detect a 'Spark'—a non-powered individual with the latent potential to become an Esper.

abilities.name: Awaken the Spark
abilities.description: On a 10+, you perform a difficult ritual to forcibly activate a latent Esper's Cortex, turning them into a full-fledged Esper. On a 7-9, the awakening is traumatic and inflicts Permanent Corruption. On a 6-, the potential is burned out forever.

green-thumb.name: The Green Thumb
green-thumb.philosophy: The pulse of life is not limited to blood. The Green Thumb has attuned their Aetheric Cortex to the unique biological frequencies of the plant kingdom. They are gardeners, botanists, and masters of flora, able to sense the needs of plants and accelerate their growth with a touch.

abilities.name: Enhance Growth
abilities.description: You channel life-giving Aether into a plant, dramatically accelerating its growth cycle. You can touch a seed or small plant and cause it to grow to its full maturity in a matter of minutes.

abilities.name: Treat Plants
abilities.description: You use your healing abilities to mend damage to plants or purge them of disease and corruption. You can touch a diseased or damaged plant and restore it to health.

abilities.name: Horticultural Mastery
abilities.description: You possess an intuitive, encyclopedic knowledge of plant life. You are considered to have an Expert (+1) skill rank in Science (Botany). You can identify any plant, know its properties, and understand what it needs to thrive.

green-smith.name: The Green Smith
green-smith.philosophy: Nature can be improved. The Green Smith is a master horticulturalist who actively designs plants for greater utility, yield, and resilience.

abilities.name: Enhance Yield
abilities.description: You can touch a fruiting or flowering plant and cause it to produce a massive, bumper crop, far exceeding its natural output.

abilities.name: Reinforce Harvest
abilities.description: You can imbue a plant with unnatural durability, making wood as hard as steel, fibers as strong as cable, or bark as tough as armor plating.

abilities.name: Tier 1 Plant Mods
abilities.description: You can perform a form of plant 'gene-splicing,' taking a single, simple trait from one plant and grafting it onto another.

blight-smith.name: The Blight Smith
blight-smith.philosophy: Survival at any cost. The Blight Smith has been warped by the Blight, becoming a master of the twisted, toxic life that thrives in those poisoned lands.

abilities.name: Blight Resistance
abilities.description: Your own body has adapted. You are highly resistant to the toxic and corrupting effects of the Blight.

abilities.name: Blight Mutations
abilities.description: You can take a normal plant and infuse it with the Blight's corrupting energy, forcing grotesque but useful mutations: pitcher plants that drip acid, vines that constrict with unnatural strength, or flowers that release hallucinogenic pollen.

abilities.name: Virulent Blight
abilities.description: You can enhance the growth and spread of existing Blighted flora, causing it to rapidly overgrow an area.

beast-doctor.name: The Beast Doctor
beast-doctor.philosophy: Life is life, whether it walks on two legs or four. The Beast Doctor has attuned their healing abilities specifically to the non-human creatures of the world.

abilities.name: Heal Chimera
abilities.description: Your Triage and Treatment Moves are exceptionally effective when used on animals or Chimeras. When healing them, you can choose to clear one additional Stun box or automatically succeed on a Treatment roll without needing to roll the dice.

abilities.name: Scent of the Median
abilities.description: You passively emit a complex series of pheromones that are calming to non-human animals. They instinctively recognize you as a non-threatening, even comforting, presence. Animals will not willingly attack you unless you or an ally act aggressively toward them first.

researcher.name: The Researcher
researcher.philosophy: To understand is to protect. The Researcher is dedicated to observing, cataloging, and understanding the strange fauna of Sidonia without interfering.

abilities.name: Zoology Mastery
abilities.description: You possess an encyclopedic, intuitive knowledge of the animal kingdom. You are considered to have an Expert (+1) skill rank in Science (Zoology).

abilities.name: Aetheric Stealth
abilities.description: When you are solely observing and not interacting, animals and non-sentient creatures are completely unaware of your presence. You have a massive advantage on any stealth rolls made to avoid detection by animals.

abilities.name: Short-Range Bioscan
abilities.description: You have learned to perform your Bioscan from a short distance (up to 15 feet), allowing you to gather data without needing to risk physical contact.

weaver.name: The Weaver
weaver.philosophy: The Weaver perceives the world not as solid objects, but as an intricate tapestry of energy and patterns. They are living conduits, attuned to the flow of power, the geometry of space, and the subtle rhythms of reality. They do not force their will upon the world like a Sorcerer; instead, they gently pluck at the threads of existence to create their desired effect.

abilities.name: Sense Energy
abilities.description: You can attune your senses to perceive the flow of energy around you. This includes electrical currents in the walls, the heat signature of a living being, or the Aetheric glow of a magical effect. As an action, the GM will describe the significant energy sources in your immediate vicinity.

abilities.name: Pattern Recognition
abilities.description: Your mind is naturally inclined to see the patterns in all things. Once per scene, you can study a situation or an opponent and ask the GM for the 'pattern.' The GM will reveal a single, exploitable pattern.

abilities.name: Disrupt Energy
abilities.description: By creating a small, dissonant pulse of Aether, you can interfere with a targeted energy pattern. You can target a single, simple electronic device and cause it to temporarily malfunction, or you can attempt to disrupt a sustained magical effect, causing it to flicker or weaken for a moment.

web-walker.name: The Web Walker
web-walker.philosophy: Space is not a barrier; it is a path. The Web Walker has focused their understanding of patterns onto the physical geometry of the world. They are the ultimate parkour artists and masters of positioning.

abilities.name: Spatial Awareness
abilities.description: You possess a perfect, intuitive sense of distance, dimension, and relation. You never suffer penalties for misjudging the distance for a thrown weapon, a leap, or a ranged attack.

abilities.name: Geometry Mastery
abilities.description: Your understanding of angles and trajectories is supernatural. You can perform impossible trick shots with thrown objects or ranged weapons, bouncing them off walls to strike targets behind cover.

abilities.name: Navigate Terrain
abilities.description: You see the 'weave' of the environment, allowing you to move across it with uncanny efficiency. You can move through any complex or difficult terrain at your full speed without penalty.

flicker.name: The Flicker
flicker.philosophy: Reality is a suggestion. The Flicker treats space as a mutable, optional construct. They are a glitch in the world.

abilities.name: Reflexive Displacement
abilities.description: Once per scene, when an attack would kill you or inflict a maiming injury, you may choose to 'flicker.' You instantly teleport a few feet to an adjacent safe location, causing the attack to miss completely.

abilities.name: Far-Sighted
abilities.description: You can manipulate the space between your eyes and a distant object, effectively creating a 'zoom lens' out of thin air. You gain telescopic vision.

abilities.name: Line-of-Sight Teleport
abilities.description: You can instantly teleport to any location you can see within a significant range (e.g., up to 500m).

overclocker.name: The Overclocker
overclocker.philosophy: The body is a capacitor. The Overclocker has attuned their Aether-organ to the raw, crackling energy of electricity, using it to supercharge their own nervous system.

abilities.name: Absorb Electricity
abilities.description: When you would be damaged by a source of electricity, you can make a roll to absorb it. On a success, you take no damage and gain a 'Charge.'

abilities.name: Boost Reflexes
abilities.description: By expending a Charge, you can choose to automatically win an Initiative roll or gain a significant bonus to a single Agility-based defense roll.

abilities.name: Accelerate
abilities.description: By expending a Charge, you may take one additional Move action on your turn.

web-spinner.name: The Web Spinner
web-spinner.philosophy: The world is a story, and I have read ahead. The Web Spinner sees the patterns not in space, but in time and choice. They are masters of causality, seeing the threads of probability that connect actions to outcomes.

abilities.name: Perfect Time
abilities.description: You have a flawless internal chronometer. You have an advantage on all rolls where precise timing is the most critical factor.

abilities.name: Fleeting Glimpses
abilities.description: At the GM's discretion, or once per session at a dramatic moment, you receive a cryptic, one-sentence vision of the future. You have no control over what you see or when you see it.

abilities.name: Predictive Analysis
abilities.description: After observing an opponent for one round, you can make a roll. On a success, the GM will tell you the most likely action your opponent will take on their next turn.

child-of-eris.name: The Child of Eris
child-of-eris.path: Weaver -> Web Spinner -> Child of Eris
child-of-eris.philosophy: Chaos is not a pit; it is a ladder. The Child of Eris thrives in chaos and misfortune, seeing the Dissonance Pool as a resource to be manipulated.

abilities.name: Chaos is Opportunity
abilities.description: Once per session, you can draw upon the Dissonance Pool's chaotic energy. The more DP in the pool, the greater the minor, positive coincidence you can create for yourself.

abilities.name: Double Down
abilities.description: You can choose to deliberately fail a roll or accept a major complication. When you do, you may add 2 DP directly to the Dissonance Pool.

abilities.name: Even Odds
abilities.description: When an opponent has a clear advantage, you can activate this move to 'even the odds.' For the next exchange, that opponent loses their advantage entirely.

hex-witch.name: The Hex
hex-witch.philosophy: If misfortune exists, it should be directed. The Hex has learned to gather the ambient bad luck of the world and focus it into a targeted, personal curse.

abilities.name: Curse Mark
abilities.description: You bear a physical mark that visibly darkens or grows more complex each time you place a Hex.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: You can touch a target and place a Hex upon them. The next time that target attempts a critical, important action, their roll automatically fails in a disastrous way. Once triggered, your Curse Mark recedes slightly.

abilities.name: Last Laugh
abilities.description: If you are killed, all the stored energy in your Curse Mark is violently discharged. The person who killed you is immediately afflicted with a powerful Hex that triggers at the worst possible moment.

witness.name: The Witness
witness.philosophy: I am where I am meant to be. The Witness is a passive conduit for causality, fated to be present at every pivotal moment.

abilities.name: Face in the Crowd
abilities.description: You have a unique Aetheric 'non-presence' and are remarkably unremarkable, blending into any group with supernatural ease. You have an advantage on any roll made to go unnoticed.

abilities.name: Right Time and Place
abilities.description: Once per story arc, you can tell the GM you are 'following the feeling.' The GM will then narrate how you end up in a location or situation that is critically important to the plot.

abilities.name: Astute Observations
abilities.description: After a major event has occurred in a scene you are present for, you can make a Pattern Recognition roll to notice one critical detail that is not immediately obvious.

oracle.name: The Oracle
oracle.philosophy: The future whispers, but rarely speaks clearly. The Oracle is attuned to the grand, sweeping patterns of causality, receiving symbolic, metaphorical glimpses of what is to come.

abilities.name: Near-Sighted
abilities.description: Your visions and prophecies almost always pertain to events that will occur within the next year, and often much sooner.

abilities.name: Metaphorical Messaging
abilities.description: When you use your Fleeting Glimpses ability, the GM will describe the vision not as a direct event, but as a series of 2-3 symbolic images (e.g., 'A cracked porcelain mask, a wilting white rose'). It is up to you to interpret their meaning.

abilities.name: Connecting Events
abilities.description: When you receive a new vision, you can ask the GM if it 'resonates' with any previous vision you have had. If there is a causal or thematic link, the GM will confirm it.

web-warper.name: The Web Warper
web-warper.philosophy: A perfect pattern is a boring pattern. The Web Warper has embraced dissonance, finding power and beauty in the corruption of pure systems. They are agents of chaos.

abilities.name: Taste of the Fruit
abilities.description: Once per scene, you can look at a target (a person, a machine, a plan) and ask the GM for its 'corrupting truth.' The GM will tell you a single, hidden flaw, secret desire, or repressed vice that can be exploited.

abilities.name: Counter-Harmonies
abilities.description: You instinctively move against the rhythm of your opponents, disrupting their flow. You gain a bonus to all defensive rolls made to dodge or parry.

abilities.name: Localized Distortion
abilities.description: You can target a 20-foot area. For the rest of the scene, all technology within that area becomes unreliable—lights flicker, audio becomes garbled with static, and any rolls made to operate complex machinery are at a penalty.

banshee.name: The Banshee
banshee.philosophy: Sound is the perfect weapon. The Banshee has focused their corrupting influence into their voice, turning it into an instrument capable of shattering both matter and flesh.

abilities.name: Soundscape
abilities.description: You have a perfect, 360-degree 'sonar' sense, allowing you to perceive the exact location of any object or person that is making even the slightest noise.

abilities.name: Shatter Song
abilities.description: You can attune your voice to the resonant frequency of a single, non-living object and unleash a focused cry. On a successful roll, the object cracks or shatters.

abilities.name: Death Song
abilities.description: You unleash a scream tuned to the frequency of living tissue. A single target you can see must make a difficult Physique roll or take significant direct Wound damage. Using this power is agonizing, and you also suffer 1 point of Wound damage.

nightstalker.name: The Nightstalker
nightstalker.philosophy: The shadow is my home. The Nightstalker has learned to weave dissonance into light itself, creating pockets of unnatural darkness.

abilities.name: Aetheric Stealth
abilities.description: You can instinctively dampen your Aetheric signature, making you incredibly difficult to detect by magical or psychic means.

abilities.name: Cloak of Shadows
abilities.description: As an action, you can deepen all the shadows in your immediate area, creating patches of supernatural darkness and reducing visibility for everyone.

abilities.name: Shadowy Defense
abilities.description: While you are in dim light or darkness, your form becomes blurred and indistinct. Any attack made against you suffers a penalty.

web-eater.name: The Web Eater
web-eater.philosophy: A pattern exists only to be unmade. The Web Eater has turned their perception of the world's patterns toward a single, horrifying purpose: erasure. They have become attuned to the ultimate anti-pattern, the Void. They do not just disrupt energy; they negate it, unraveling the very threads of magic and existence.

abilities.name: Void Sense
abilities.description: You can sense the 'gaps' in reality, the places where the Void touches the world.

abilities.name: Pass Ward
abilities.description: You can temporarily attune a magical ward or barrier to the frequency of the Void, causing a momentary 'hole' in its defense that you can slip through.

abilities.name: Rune Breaker
abilities.description: You can touch a simple runic inscription and flood it with chaotic Void energy, causing the structured magic to collapse.

mage-eater.name: The Mage Eater
mage-eater.philosophy: Magic is a flaw to be corrected. The Mage Eater is a living counter-spell, their very presence anathema to sorcery and enchantment.

abilities.name: Enchantment Entropy
abilities.description: Your connection to the Void is so strong that your mere presence destabilizes magic. Enchanted items temporarily lose their magical properties while you are holding them.

abilities.name: Array Breaker
abilities.description: An evolution of Rune Breaker. You can now unravel complex, powerful, and permanent magical arrays with a touch.

abilities.name: Spell Eater
abilities.description: You don't just cancel a spell; you consume it, drawing its power into the Void. This move allows you to automatically negate a single spell targeted at you.

void-born.name: The Void Born
void-born.philosophy: I am the encroaching emptiness. The Void Born has become a living gateway to the Void, a being of existence whose purpose is to create non-existence.

abilities.name: Void Defense
abilities.description: Your body is partially phased with the Void. You gain a universal armor value against ALL forms of damage as a portion of all incoming energy simply ceases to exist upon contact.

abilities.name: Death Sentence
abilities.description: Your existence is a lit fuse. Every time you channel the ultimate power of the Void, a piece of your own existence is permanently erased. You have a finite number of uses of your Void Blade ability before your own soul is completely negated.

abilities.name: Void Blade
abilities.description: As an action, you can summon a blade of pure, shimmering nothingness for a single strike. This attack automatically hits and cannot be blocked, parried, or soaked by any armor, magical or mundane.

summoner.name: The Summoner
summoner.philosophy: The Summoner is a bridge between worlds, a conduit for consciousness. They do not just call upon external forces; they invite, create, or give birth to them. Their power lies in their ability to manifest other beings into the physical world, each with its own unique nature, strengths, and perils.

abilities.name: Spirit Sense
abilities.description: You can automatically sense the presence and general direction of any significant, free-willed supernatural entity in your immediate vicinity. This does not allow you to see the entity or know its specific nature, only that something powerful and 'other' is nearby.

abilities.name: Aetheric Echoes
abilities.description: You can focus on a specific location or object, opening your mind to the psychic residue left behind by moments of intense emotion. On a 10+, you receive a clear sensory flash. On a 7-9, the echo is fragmented. On a 6-, you connect to a meaningless echo.

abilities.name: Sprite Summoning
abilities.description: You can give form and purpose to the simplest of 'spirits'—the Sprites. At character creation, you define three types of Sprites you are attuned to, each with a single, simple function (e.g., Messenger, Warden, Spark). As an action, you can summon one of your known Sprites to perform its function.

animata.name: The Animata (Mind Path)
animata.philosophy: Creation through intellect. The Animata does not borrow spirits; they build them. They are magical engineers, treating the Aether as raw code and animating force.

abilities.name: Bond Sprite
abilities.description: Designate one of your Sprites as your 'Bonded Sprite.' This Sprite is now a permanent companion, is more intelligent, and can follow more complex commands.

abilities.name: Animate the Inanimate
abilities.description: On a 10+, temporarily imbue a simple, mundane object with an animating spirit that will follow one simple, ongoing command for the scene. On a 7-9, the animation is flawed.

abilities.name: Conditional Commands
abilities.description: You can now imbue your animated servants with simple IF-THEN logic.

operator.name: The Operator
operator.philosophy: The Ghost in the Machine. The Operator moves beyond simple commands to form a direct, one-to-one interface with their creations. They become their constructs.

abilities.name: Remote Pilot
abilities.description: You project your consciousness into one of your active animated constructs, seeing through its 'eyes' and controlling its every move directly. Your physical body remains behind, unconscious and vulnerable.

abilities.name: Overclock Construct
abilities.description: You flood your construct with an overwhelming amount of your own mental energy, pushing its physical form past its design limits for a short burst of incredible performance. At the end of the effect, the construct suffers significant, lasting damage.

abilities.name: Engineering Mastery
abilities.description: Through your work with constructs, you have gained an intuitive, profound understanding of mechanics and engineering. You are considered to have an Expert (+1) skill rank in Engineering.

dollmaker.name: The Dollmaker
dollmaker.philosophy: The Legion of One. The Dollmaker has moved beyond single constructs to command a small army of puppets. Their power is not in the strength of one servant, but in the coordinated action of many.

abilities.name: Master of Puppets
abilities.description: You can split your consciousness, animating and directing a number of simple constructs (up to your Presence attribute) simultaneously with the same simple, conditional command.

abilities.name: Puppet Networking
abilities.description: Your horde of puppets acts with uncanny coordination, relaying sensor data to each other and working together on complex tasks without your direct input.

abilities.name: Purposeful Puppetry
abilities.description: During Downtime, you can modify your inanimate puppets for specific roles (e.g., a 'bearer' to carry heavy loads, a 'hitter' with weighted clubs).

corpse-lord.name: The Corpse Lord
corpse-lord.philosophy: Flesh is the Ultimate Puppet. The Corpse Lord has turned their art of animation from inorganic matter to the far more pliable medium of the dead.

abilities.name: Fuel for the Horde
abilities.description: Your Spirit Sense is now attuned to the specific resonance of death. You can automatically sense the location and number of any intact dead bodies within a significant radius.

abilities.name: Animate the Horde
abilities.description: An evolution of Master of Puppets, this allows you to raise and command a large number of undead servants at once.

abilities.name: Master the Horde
abilities.description: Your horde acts as a single, coordinated entity. You can give them complex conditional commands, and they will execute them with mindless, relentless efficiency.

medium.name: The Medium (Body Path)
medium.philosophy: The body is a gateway. The Medium uses their own physical and spiritual essence as a conduit, a meeting ground for forces from beyond.

abilities.name: Spirit Pact
abilities.description: Initiate a formal, binding negotiation with a spirit to create a contract. The negotiation itself is a roleplaying scene. If a pact is agreed upon, its terms are magically binding.

abilities.name: Spirit Speak
abilities.description: Your Aether-organ acts as a universal translator for spiritual consciousness, allowing for clearer communication. You have an advantage on all rolls made to negotiate with or understand a spiritual entity.

abilities.name: Channel Spirit
abilities.description: You open your body as a temporary vessel, allowing a spirit you have a connection with to speak and perceive through you for a scene. You remain in control, but the spirit's presence can be mentally taxing.

champion.name: The Champion
champion.philosophy: Partnership is power. The Champion has chosen to align themselves with the spirits, acting as their agent, ally, and anchor in the physical world.

abilities.name: Spirit Bond
abilities.description: You forge a permanent, symbiotic bond with a single, specific spirit, who becomes your patron.

abilities.name: Spirit Boon
abilities.description: Your patron spirit grants you a permanent passive benefit related to its nature (e.g., a fire spirit might grant you resistance to heat; a spirit of knowledge might give you a bonus to Lore rolls). This is defined with the GM.

abilities.name: Spirit Host
abilities.description: You can allow your patron spirit to partially merge with you for a scene, granting you access to one of its minor powers or skills.

exorcist.name: The Exorcist
exorcist.philosophy: This world is for the living. The Exorcist sees rogue spirits and Wraiths not as beings to be negotiated with, but as infections to be contained and purged.

abilities.name: Restrict
abilities.description: You can create a temporary 'fence' of Aether in an area that a specific spirit or type of spirit cannot cross.

abilities.name: Banish
abilities.description: You can perform a ritual to sever a spirit's anchor to the physical world, forcefully ejecting it back into the deep Aether.

abilities.name: Extort
abilities.description: You can use the threat of a Banish or Restrict to force a spirit into an unfavorable Spirit Pact.

automata.name: The Automata (Spirit Path)
automata.philosophy: The soul requires a vessel. They prepare and offer inanimate objects—statues, armor, machines—as suitable hosts for spirits.

abilities.name: Spirit Pact
abilities.description: Initiate a formal, binding negotiation with a spirit to convince it to inhabit a vessel you have prepared. If a pact is agreed upon, the spirit is bound to the vessel and your terms.

abilities.name: Prepare Vessel
abilities.description: You perform a ritual over a non-living object during Downtime to make it more appealing and stable for a spirit to inhabit. A prepared vessel makes any Spirit Pact negotiation easier.

abilities.name: Spirit Vessel I
abilities.description: You can successfully create vessels for and forge pacts with spirits of a low power tier.

facilitator.name: The Facilitator
facilitator.philosophy: The broker of worlds. The Facilitator has built a reputation in the Aether and spirits actively seek them out for the opportunity to gain a physical vessel.

abilities.name: Spirit Favor
abilities.description: Your reputation precedes you. You gain a permanent bonus to all Social rolls made when negotiating a Spirit Pact.

abilities.name: Spirit Vessel II
abilities.description: Your skill has grown immensely. You can now prepare vessels of exquisite quality, capable of containing more powerful and influential spirits of a medium power tier.

abilities.name: Spirit Domain
abilities.description: You can temporarily attune an area's Aetheric resonance to match that of a specific spirit, granting an advantage on any attempt to summon, negotiate with, or command that spirit within the area.

contractor.name: The Contractor
contractor.philosophy: The deal is the art. The Contractor is a master of supernatural law, facilitating binding agreements between spirits and mortals.

abilities.name: Index Arcanum
abilities.description: You maintain a 'mental Rolodex' of spirits. When a client needs a specific service, you can make a Lore roll to know which spirit in your Index would be the best fit for the job.

abilities.name: Aetheric Contract
abilities.description: You can draft a physical or psychic document that, once agreed upon by two or more parties (one must be a spirit), is magically absolute.

abilities.name: Soul Brand
abilities.description: As part of the contract, you can weave a minor sympathetic link between the signing parties, allowing them to feel each other's general emotional state or know when the bargain is fulfilled or broken.

psychomata.name: The Psychomata (Dream Path)
psychomata.philosophy: My mind is a world. The Psychomata summoner births their servants from the raw, unfiltered stuff of their own subconscious. Their summons are living emotions, walking metaphors, and fragments of dreams made real.

abilities.name: The Lucid Legion
abilities.description: You can summon a number of Psychomata at once. They are amorphous and their nature is determined by your current emotional state. They are not under your direct control and will act according to their core emotion.

abilities.name: Conscript the Collective
abilities.description: As an action, you can give a single, one-word command (e.g., 'Attack,' 'Flee,' 'Protect') to all of your active Psychomata. They will obey this command for one round before reverting to their instinctual behavior.

abilities.name: The Waking Dream
abilities.description: When your Psychomata are active, the immediate environment changes to reflect the nature of your summoned entity (e.g., fear causes shadows to deepen, joy causes colors to oversaturate). This provides a narrative bonus or penalty to social interactions.

pathos-mutation.name: The Pathos Mutation
pathos-mutation.philosophy: The nightmare is real. The summoner has embraced the darkest corners of their mind. Their summons are no longer just emotions; they are anxieties, traumas, and predatory urges made manifest.

abilities.name: The Waking Nightmare
abilities.description: Your Waking Dream effect is now permanently twisted. The world around you becomes a terrifying tableau of your inner horrors. You gain an advantage on all Intimidation rolls.

abilities.name: The Devouring Dream
abilities.description: Your nightmares feed on the fear they create. When an enemy is successfully frightened by your summons or your aura, your summons' duration in the physical world is extended.

abilities.name: The Devil's Bargain
abilities.description: You have no real control, only leverage. You can make a pact with your nightmares, offering them a chance to indulge their dark appetites in exchange for a specific service.

mythos.name: The Mythos Focus
mythos.philosophy: I will write my own story. The summoner has begun to structure their inner world, transforming chaotic dreams into a coherent, personal mythology.

abilities.name: The Myth of I
abilities.description: You work with your GM to define the core 'Mythos' of your summons (e.g., The Carnival of Souls, The Clockwork Legion). This defines the aesthetic and hierarchy of all your future summons.

abilities.name: When in Need
abilities.description: When you summon your Lucid Legion, you can choose to summon one specific, more powerful 'officer' from your Mythos instead of a group of lesser ones.

abilities.name: Mass Summons
abilities.description: You can fully open the gates to your inner world, letting your Mythos spill into reality, summoning a large horde of your lesser Mythos creatures at once.

linker.name: The Linker
linker.philosophy: The mind is a network. The Linker is the ultimate force multiplier, an Esper whose Aetheric Cortex functions like a biological wireless router. They do not excel in personal combat or overt power, but in their unparalleled ability to forge psychic connections between conscious minds.

abilities.name: Basic 5x5 Link
abilities.description: You can establish a wide-net psychic link with up to five willing individuals, including yourself, for a scene. All linked members share a general awareness of each other's location and status. You can send simple, one-sentence commands telepathically to the entire group. All linked members gain a minor bonus (+1) to any roll made as part of a coordinated group action.

abilities.name: Basic 2-Way Link
abilities.description: You can create a deeper, more intimate connection between yourself and one other willing individual. For the duration of a scene, you and your linked partner can communicate freely and instantly, thought-to-thought. You share a clear sense of each other's emotional state and can even share fleeting sensory impressions.

abilities.name: Sense Sentience
abilities.description: You can automatically sense the presence and approximate number of sentient minds in your immediate vicinity, even through walls. You cannot read their thoughts, only know that they are there.

bonder.name: The Bonder ('Soulmate' Path)
bonder.philosophy: Two minds, one purpose. The Bonder has forsaken the wide net in favor of perfecting the deep, intimate two-way link.

abilities.name: Establish Permanent Bond
abilities.description: Through repeated linking and a deep emotional connection, you can forge a permanent, unbreakable two-way link with one specific individual. You are always aware of each other's general status, no matter the distance.

abilities.name: Approaching Resonance
abilities.description: This is a narrative-focused move. The longer you are bonded, the more your minds start to bleed into one another, leading to shared tics, skill-bleed, or emotional transference.

companion.name: The Companion
companion.philosophy: My bond is my strength. The Companion has dedicated themselves to the art of the two-way link, creating a partnership so profound that the two linked individuals become more than the sum of their parts.

abilities.name: Advanced Bond
abilities.description: The psychic 'bandwidth' of your permanent bond is increased. You can now share simple sentences, brief impressions, and some sensory information (sight and sound) with your partner within 100m.

abilities.name: Empathic Transfer
abilities.description: As an action, you can make a roll to either absorb a negative emotional state from your partner onto yourself, or grant them a positive emotional state you are feeling, giving them an advantage on their next relevant roll.

abilities.name: Synergistic Actions
abilities.description: Whenever you and your bonded partner perform a coordinated action against the same target, you both gain a significant bonus (+2) to your rolls.

passenger.name: The Passenger
passenger.philosophy: I am a silent observer. The Passenger has honed their linking ability for pure infiltration and espionage, hitchhiking on the consciousness of others.

abilities.name: Borrow Senses
abilities.description: You can project your consciousness into a target you can touch, becoming a passive observer within their mind. You can see, hear, taste, and smell everything your host experiences.

abilities.name: Stowaway
abilities.description: You have learned to muffle your psychic presence, making it incredibly difficult for even other meta-humans to detect your mental passenger.

abilities.name: Host Hopping
abilities.description: While you are a passenger in a host, if they make physical contact with another person, you can make a roll to instantly transfer your consciousness from your current host to the new one.

hub.name: The Hub
hub.philosophy: One mind, many bodies. The Hub has dedicated themself to mastering the complex art of the 5x5 link. They are the ultimate team captain, the central server through which all communication and coordination flows.

abilities.name: Advanced 5x5 Link
abilities.description: Your team-based link is now more stable and has greater bandwidth. The coordination bonus increases to +2, and you can relay fleeting sensory data to the group.

abilities.name: Switchboard
abilities.description: You can now function as a psychic switchboard operator, creating private, firewalled channels within your larger 5x5 link.

abilities.name: Approaching Resonance
abilities.description: The more a team works together under the Hub's link, the more they will develop shared mannerisms, finish each other's sentences, and anticipate each other's actions without needing explicit commands.

orchestrator.name: The Orchestrator
orchestrator.philosophy: The team is my symphony. The Orchestrator processes information, anticipates actions, and directs their team with such precision that every movement is part of a grander design.

abilities.name: Multi-Tasker
abilities.description: You can manage your link's communication and tactical input without penalty to your own physical actions.

abilities.name: Tactical Mastery
abilities.description: When directing your team, you always know the most tactically advantageous action for each member to take. When you issue a command that aligns with this optimal strategy, the affected ally gains a +1 bonus to their roll.

abilities.name: Tactical Overview
abilities.description: As an action, you can activate your Tactical Overview. You gain a perfect, bird's-eye view of the entire operational area covered by your link.

conductor.name: The Conductor
conductor.philosophy: I am the perfect strategy. The Conductor is the ultimate tactical genius, capable of orchestrating a perfectly synchronized, devastating attack.

abilities.name: Assessment
abilities.description: You can perfectly assess the capabilities of any individual within your link. You know their exact skill levels, current status, and even their emotional state.

abilities.name: Synergy Boost
abilities.description: You can temporarily push your team members to greater heights. For one turn, every member of your link gains a +1 bonus to all their rolls.

abilities.name: Master Stroke
abilities.description: You spend an entire round planning. On the next round, you can execute a perfectly synchronized chain of actions involving every member of your team that culminates in a single, devastating attack against a target.

animist.name: The Animist
animist.philosophy: All life is a network. The Animist attunes their mind not to the logic of humanity, but to the primal, instinctual consciousness of the animal kingdom.

abilities.name: Primal Link
abilities.description: You can successfully establish your Basic 5x5 Link or Basic 2-Way Link with non-human, animalistic minds.

abilities.name: Primal Speech
abilities.description: You can communicate complex ideas and understand the non-verbal 'language' of any animal you are linked with.

abilities.name: Approaching Resonance
abilities.description: Your mind begins to align with the beasts you link with. You start to think more instinctually, while they may adopt some of your more complex reasoning.

beast-breeder.name: The Beast Breeder
beast-breeder.philosophy: The pack is family. The Beast Breeder focuses on raising, managing, and understanding entire groups of animals.

abilities.name: Advanced Primal Link
abilities.description: You can now include a large number of animals in a single Primal Link, creating a pack that functions as a single entity.

abilities.name: Pack Dynamics
abilities.description: You have an intuitive understanding of how to manage a diverse group of creatures, even those that would not normally coexist, fostering a cohesive and loyal pack.

abilities.name: Zoology Mastery
abilities.description: You possess an encyclopedic knowledge of animal biology, behavior, and needs.

beast-tamer.name: The Beast Tamer
beast-tamer.philosophy: Every beast has a soul. The Beast Tamer focuses on forming a deep, empathetic bond with individual creatures.

abilities.name: Primal Empathy
abilities.description: You can feel the precise emotional state of any animal you are linked with, allowing you to calm it, earn its trust, or understand the source of its aggression.

abilities.name: Primal Behaviorist
abilities.description: You understand animal psychology so perfectly that you can predict a creature's most likely course of action in any situation.

abilities.name: Zoology Mastery
abilities.description: You possess an encyclopedic knowledge of animal biology, behavior, and needs.
